name: soul-dew
effect: Held by Latias or Latios: Increases the holder's Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.
short_effect: Raises Latias and Latios's Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.

SP. ATK & SP. DEF
of LATIOS & LATIAS.
